claim: Tom Hardy appeared in Inception (2010) as Kevin.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has appeared in three Christopher Nolan films : the science fiction thriller Inception  (  2010  )  , portrayed Bane in the superhero film The Dark Knight Rises  (  2012  )  , and the action-thriller Dunkirk  (  2017  )  based on the British evacuation in World War II .
